messages.content: Idk why you got downvoted but heres an upvote
These memes are either on a 9gag level or r/funny levels of comedy. And I can't tell which is worse.
I'd imagine the confusion would be far greater, especially amongst the [RELIGION] community considering there is no aspect of Ramadan that prevents [NAME] from doing exams.
I guess there's this, but that's all I can think of.
Im not 😀 Glad you realize your mistake and why I was confused 😉
What? I didn’t understand a thing of what you said.
Where were they? I was trying to track them down and couldn’t remember where I saw them.
Possible maybe, not at all plausible.
I can't understand why Pepsi and Coke are the two most popular sodas. Or why fans think they're so different.
Really not sure how that’s your takeaway.
I don’t understand how her parents were able to take kid when she claims they are horrible alcoholics
He doesn't actually run a 4.49. It's a little deceiving because he's pretty sneaky, so I can understand you being confused.
Crippling? How so? It’s with Fox Sports right? I figured they probably had a good deal with them, but maybe not.
I'm talking about statement in 11 july, not 14 july. I think you are confused. I posted 11 july statement
I don't understand how her hair is 'too light' or how that effects the concealer.
I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO DO WITH MY HANDS
I think in 1.0 it's a lot harder to SDI out of Fox's dair, but I forget why
I don't know who wrote what, but good call - the d's are completely different from one to the other.
I don't remember, it was all very hazy...
Oh [NAME]. But I'm sort of confused as to how the pic was taken, sorry if you said it but I'm a bit stupid and tired
Maybe he *did* leave the building. If you can't find him, he could've left without you knowing. Is that better or worse?
I think that's just natural, humans weren't really intended to fly by nature so I guess it just feels wrong or something, idk
Maybe she was attempting to be ironic? I dunno, man, people are just an enigma.
I know. I didn't say I agreed with it did I?
Is...Is this a Hitman themed FE Shitpost?...I dunno whether to be happy or impressed by this.
I'm guessing that it maybe due to being overwhelmed w/ responses and having a relatively small staff to go through all the forms.
I like having roads, schools, and drinkable water? You confuse a man for a paranoid.
I don’t know how to link but if you search within this page there was a whole thread on it
She said she was ok moving out ... now she isn’t. I have no idea.
Wouldn’t doubt its for good reasons, just didn’t understand what the were.
Difficult to see how this video wouldn’t have been much more interesting if properly shot in landscape.
